name: The Ultimate Trivia Challenge
description: How well do you know your trivia? Test your knowledge in The Ultimate Trivia Challenge! FEATURES - Includes Your 9 Favorite Categories. - High Quality Graphics. - Party Mode (2-4 players locally). - Gamepad Support. - Family Friendly. - Fun for all ages. So what are you waiting for?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
